activities.name: send email update for Product_Insight script

body.value:
{
 "title":"PIPELINE RUN FOR Product_Insight_script FAILED",
 "color":"RED",
 "message":"Debug the Product_Insight_script and run the Pipeline again",
 "dataFactoryName":"@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
 "pipelineName":"@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
 "pipelineRunId":"@{pipeline().RunId}",
 "time":"@{utcnow()}"
}

sink.preCopyScript:
DECLARE @month VARCHAR(20) = DATENAME(MONTH, GETDATE()) + '_' + CAST(YEAR(GETDATE()) AS VARCHAR(4))
DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(MAX)

SET @sql = 'ALTER TABLE [dbo].[pi_pivot_2023] ADD ' + @month + ' DECIMAL(18,0)'
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'pi_pivot_2023' AND COLUMN_NAME = @month)
BEGIN
  EXEC(@sql)
END
